product_name: Garmin Monterra GPS with U.S. TOPO
long_description: With TOPO U.S. 100K maps, an 8-megapixel camera and wireless Android compatability, this 4 in. touch screen delivers state-of-the-art navigation alongside your favorite Android apps from Google Play.
short_description: With TOPO U.S. 100K maps, an 8-megapixel camera and wireless Android compatability, this 4 in. touch screen delivers state-of-the-art navigation alongside your favorite Android apps from Google Play.
